Package It.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Match

java.lang.Object
It.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable
It.polimi.ingsw.Model.Match
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Match extends Observable implements Serializable
This class is the main class of the game, which contains the main methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      public Match(int numberOfPlayers, int GameMode)
      Constructor of the class Match. This method manages the start of the game, takes care of filling the bag with the students, filling Entrance of the school for each player, preparing the table of islands, clouds, schools, initializing the players, the professors, the Character Card. Handles the case in which there are 2 or 3 players, or you choose to play with the variant for experts.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - : the number of players (2 or 3) in the game.
      GameMode - : 1 for the variant for experts, 0 for classic game.

  • Method Details

    • getBag

      public Bag getBag()
      Return the bag containing the students.
      Returns:
      the bag containing the students.

    • MoveStudentsBagToIsland

      public void MoveStudentsBagToIsland(int index)
      Add the student extracted from the bag to the island at the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - : the index of an island in the table.

    • MoveStudentsBagToCloud

      public void MoveStudentsBagToCloud(int index)
      If the number of players is 2 it fills the cloud at the given index with 3 students, if the number of players is 3 it fills it with 4 students.
      Parameters:
      index - : the index of a cloud.

    • getPlayerById

      public Player getPlayerById(int PlayerId)
      Return the player at the given index in the array Players.
      Parameters:
      PlayerId - : the Id of a player.
      Returns:
      the player at the given Id.

    • PlanningPhase

      public void PlanningPhase()
      It fills 2 clouds if there are two players, 3 clouds if there are three players invoking the method MoveStudentsBagToCloud.

    • setGamePhase

      public void setGamePhase(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Its sets the attribute gamePhase.
      Parameters:
      gamePhase - : it is a phase of the game.

    • getGamePhase

      public GamePhase getGamePhase()
      Return the phase of the current match.
      Returns:
      the phase of the current match.

    • setExpectedCardMessage

      public void setExpectedCardMessage(int id)
      It sets the attribute ExpectedCardMessage.
      Parameters:
      id - : the Id of a card.

    • PlayAssistantCard

      public void PlayAssistantCard(int CardIndex, int PlayerIndex)
      It used when a player want to play an Assistant Card invoking the method PlayAssistantCard in the class Player.
      Parameters:
      CardIndex - : the index of an Assistant Card.
      PlayerIndex - : the index of the player in the array Players who play the Assistant Card.

    • MergeIslands

      public void MergeIslands(int IslandIndex, int IslandToMergeIndex)
      It used when you need to unify two islands after a player builds two towers of the same color on two adjacent islands. It unifies the two islands, moves all students, towers, mother nature to a single island and removes from the ArrayList Table the island that has been unified.
      Parameters:
      IslandIndex - : the index of an island in the ArrayList table.
      IslandToMergeIndex - : the index of an island in the ArrayList table.

    • MoveMotherNature

      public void MoveMotherNature(int movements)
      It used when the player have to move Mother Nature. It increases the position of Mother Nature by the number received as parameter. To secure the circularity of the table, when the number indicating the position of Mother Nature is Greater or equal to the size of table, it decreases the position of Mother Nature by the size of the table.
      Parameters:
      movements - : a number indicating the steps that mother nature must take.

    • MoveStudentsFromCloudToEntrance

      public void MoveStudentsFromCloudToEntrance(int PlayerId, int CloudIndex)
      It used to move students from the cloud given by parameter to the Entrance of the player given by parameter.
      Parameters:
      PlayerId - : the index of the player.
      CloudIndex - : the index of the cloud.

    • setActivePlayerId

      public void setActivePlayerId(int id)
      It initializes the attribute ActivePlayerId at the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - : the id of a player.

    • MoveStudentsFromEntranceToDiningRoom

      public void MoveStudentsFromEntranceToDiningRoom(int StudentIndex, int PlayerId)
      It used to move students at the given StudentIndex to the Dining Room of the player identified by the PlayerIndex. If the number of students in the dining room is a multiple of 3 and the game is in the expert mode the player earns a coin.
      Parameters:
      StudentIndex - : the index of a student in the Entrance of School.
      PlayerId - : the Id of a player.

    • MoveStudentsFromEntranceToIsland

      public void MoveStudentsFromEntranceToIsland(int StudentIndex, int PlayerId, int IslandIndex)
      It is used to move the student at StudentIndex from the Entrance of the School of the player identified by the PlayerIndex to the island at IslandIndex.
      Parameters:
      StudentIndex - : the index of a student in the Entrance of the School.
      PlayerId - : the id of a player in the array Players.
      IslandIndex - : the index of an island in the ArrayList table.
